column2: hlan bikum yā man lahum ‘aqlī ṣabā
kam dhā urá qāri‘ ataytuh khāḍi‘

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. raṣd al-dhayl. zajal llshshtrī

column2: yā shamsī yā badrī yā hilālī
waqul luh yā man sabá ‘aqlī wbālī
column3: in‘am lī bi-al-wiṣāl wāishfaq min ḥālī

column2: mā luh shabīh fī dhā al-bashar
yā al-wāla‘ bi-al-ḥubb āidhā ṣghīt līyā
column3: ghīr ṣbbar qalbk dābā īfarraj al-lah

column2: mā bqá fī qalbī idhā skhāūā bīyā
lāsh yā maḥbūbī tajfī blā nwīyā
column3: fiī al-mnām yāms rītak wal-jmīl lillah
